Players can pick them, always getting two clean herbs at once before getting teleported out of the garden. These two clean herbs will vary, but will always yield 50 Farming experience, or 25 experience per herb, regardless of which garden is chosen.

Patches of herbs can be found in corners of the garden's inside the Sorceress's Garden minigame. Players can pick them, always getting two clean herbs at once before getting teleported out of the garden. These two clean herbs will vary, but will always yield 50 Farming experience, or 25 experience per herb, regardless of which garden is chosen.
